title: Zarr Conventions Specification
description: JSON schema for validating Zarr conventions metadata

zarr_conventions.description: Array of convention metadata objects describing conventions that apply to this node

schema_url.description: A URL which resolves to a JSON schema document describing the convention's properties

spec_url.description: A URL which resolves to a document describing the Convention in more detail

uuid.description: A UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) that permanently identifies the convention

name.description: A short human-readable name used to represent the Convention

description.description: A concise description of the convention
